```{r panel test}

#| warning: false
for(species in unique(iris$Species)){
  a <- iris %>% dplyr::filter(Species == species) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width)) +
    geom_point() +
    ggtitle(species) +
    theme_light()
  
  cat("\n###", species, "\n")
  print(a)
  cat("\n\n")
}
```
